nodes.text: The Lesson was a comic appearing in Star Wars Tales 14 and collected in Star Wars Tales Volume 4.

The story revolves around Tu'ala, a Jedi Padawan, during the Battle of Geonosis and her journey in discovering the need for Jedi to be willing to give up their own life to serve the living Force. The story is largely told through flashbacks of Tu'ala learning from her master, Master Zuth. The lesson she learns is that destiny can lead one to be great or to help others achieve greatness through sacrifice.
